    • Method Detail

      • showDumbModeWarning

        public static void showDumbModeWarning(AnActionEvent... events)

      • getUnavailableMessage

        public static java.lang.String getUnavailableMessage(java.lang.String action,

      • performFastUpdate

        public static void performFastUpdate(boolean isInModalContext,
                                     AnAction action,
                                     AnActionEvent event,
                                     boolean forceUseCached)
        Calculates time spent for update, remember average time (with exponential smoothing) and caches update results inside action.getTemplatePresentation().getClientProperty(ACTION_UPDATE_DATA), if average time is quite big then skip update invocation and use cached presentation.
        Parameters:
        forceUseCached - use cached results for slow actions if presented (relax time doesn't take into account)

      • performDumbAwareUpdate

        public static boolean performDumbAwareUpdate(boolean isInModalContext,
                                             AnAction action,
                                             AnActionEvent e,
                                             boolean beforeActionPerformed)
        Parameters:
        action - action
        e - action event
        beforeActionPerformed - whether to call AnAction.beforeActionPerformedUpdate(AnActionEvent) or AnAction.update(AnActionEvent)
        Returns:
        true if update tried to access indices in dumb mode

      • performDumbAwareUpdate

        @Deprecated
public static boolean performDumbAwareUpdate(AnAction action,
                                             AnActionEvent e,
                                             boolean beforeActionPerformed)
        Deprecated. use performDumbAwareUpdate(boolean, AnAction, AnActionEvent, boolean) instead

      • underModalProgress

        public static <T> T underModalProgress(Project project,
                                       java.lang.String progressTitle,
                                       Computable<T> computable)
                                throws ProcessCanceledException
        Show a cancellable modal progress running the given computation under read action with the same DumbService.isAlternativeResolveEnabled() as the caller. To be used in actions which need to perform potentially long-running computations synchronously without freezing UI.
        Throws:
        ProcessCanceledException - if the user has canceled the progress. If the action can be safely stopped at this point without leaving inconsistent data behind, this exception doesn't need to be caught and processed.

      • isDumbMode

        public static boolean isDumbMode(Project project)
        Returns:
        whether a dumb mode is in progress for the passed project or, if the argument is null, for any open project.
        See Also:
        DumbService
